title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The checkbox update process does not use a busy cursor and there is no visual indication that the update is in progress.
EB: A busy cursor should be displayed during the process of updating the checkboxes to indicate that the update is in progress.
SR:
1. Open the export zip feature.
2. Enable or disable multiple checkboxes.
3. Observe that there is no visual indication that the update is happening.
4. The checkbox update process should use a busy cursor to show that the update is in progress.
